hero.subtitle: Easily find parking from the comfort of your device

findYourPark.title: Find your Park
findYourPark.subtitle: Search for a parking lot near you and find the best option for you. You can filter by price and see the location of the parking lot on the map.

rentParking.title: Rent parking
rentParking.subtitle: Fill in the following form with the information of the parking lot you want to rent. Once you have completed the form, click on the "Post parking" button to publish the parking lot.
rentParking.addressLabel: Exact address of the space to rent:

notFound.error: Error 404: Sorry, the page you are looking for could not be found.
